translations: 拱；壁炉两侧的凹圆炉壁；墙壁顶上的藏灯凹处；河湾

sentences.sentence: Wall to floor, wall to ceiling junctions are fitted with a minimum radius of 25mm profits (coving).
sentences.translation: 墙壁到地板以及墙壁到天花板的接合处都装配有半径最小为25 mm的弧形饰。

sentences.sentence: With the air bumping out, the cloth coving the background falls suddenly, which will makes great contradiction.
sentences.translation: 随着气柱的突然上冲，原先覆盖在背景板上的幕布却在瞬间落下，形成巨大反差效应。

sentences.sentence: Most of high school classmates have job, coving all categories of business in society and few of them are studying.
sentences.translation: 高中时的同学大多数都工作了，涉及社会各个行业，少数还在求学。
